name: PULL YOURSELF TOGETHER (HintOfLime)
description:
You control two balls connected by  a rope, grab onto surfaces to help swing yourself to the goal.

Controls:
  • A and D - Grab
  • Space - Pull together
  • R - Reset
  • Escape - Return to menu

This was thrown together in the last few hours of the jam mostly reusing assets I already created for my main entry BOXSTROSITY.  As such it is still a buggy mess (rope physics are hard) with only a few levels but it was a fun experiment none the less. Almost wish I'd gone with this idea initially, its quite fun!

Music by Pix
